_sText:
Hello!

The map does not have many levels and not complex, the difficulty is more with the randomness of the moving objects. But to pass 100% is real and easy!

At the beginning of the map, there is a musical accompaniment (BeatBox Sound) with a trigger attached to the player, and the other players that are next to it will hear the sound.

Also in the end there is a musical accompaniment (Funny BeatBox Sound) with a trigger to the clip and everything is the same as with the 1st version.

Design and textures on the map look good and will not be nervous.

The whole map has good lighting, there are no mistakes with textures.

I want to note that I did a map for 1 day from scratch)


I really hope that you will enjoy playing on my map!

Have a good game!
